backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles with PIN authentication, photo/video/document/memory management with role-based access control, storage limits, and blob storage integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds a PIN field to existing UserProfile records, setting empty string as default for existing users during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four PIN-related features: PIN setup during account creation, PIN verification for protected sections, PIN reset/forgot flow, and PIN change in profile settings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including PIN components, authentication hooks, page guards, UI components with glass morphism design, and Hindi/English translation support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AS19 Private Love Themed Memory Management App with mobile-optimized viewport settings and PWA capabilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component orchestrating authentication flow, profile setup, PIN setup, language synchronization, and navigation between sections with PIN session management.
Banner component displaying 'Created By Azad' with gradient styling and decorative border.
Document gallery component with download, delete (admin-only), file type icons, size formatting, and bilingual support for Hindi/English.
frontend/src/components/DocumentStorageM: Displays document storage usage metrics with a progress bar and warning alert when storage exceeds 80%, supporting bilingual display (English/Hindi).
frontend/src/components/DocumentUpload.t: Handles document file uploads with validation for file type (PDF, DOCX, TXT, Excel) and size (max 50MB), showing upload progress and bilingual toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides an elegant bilingual language selection screen with English and Hindi options, featuring animated decorative elements and a glass-effect card design.
frontend/src/components/MemoriesStorageM: Displays memories storage usage metrics with a progress bar and warning alert when storage exceeds 80%, supporting bilingual display (English/Hindi).
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Renders the main navigation bar with section tabs (Media, Photos, Videos, Documents, Memories, Storage, Profile), user avatar, PIN lock status indicator, and logout button.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Displays a photo gallery with grid view, supports photo selection, deletion (admin only), individual and bulk downloads, and shows notifications for newly added photos.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUpload.tsx: Component for uploading multiple photos with file validation (type, 15MB size limit), preview generation, progress tracking, and batch upload using ExternalBlob with lossless quality. Includes admin-only access control and bilingual toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/PinChangeForm.ts: Form component for changing user PIN with validation (4-6 digits), current PIN verification, confirmation matching, and session storage clearing on success. Displays error alerts and supports bilingual UI.
frontend/src/components/PinReset.tsx: PIN reset component requiring Internet Identity reauthentication before allowing users to set a new PIN. Includes validation, confirmation matching, and session storage clearing with back navigation support.
frontend/src/components/PinSetup.tsx: Initial PIN setup component for new users with 4-6 digit validation, confirmation matching, and animated UI with floating lock/shield icons. Saves PIN to user profile on successful setup.
PIN verification gate component that validates user-entered PIN against stored value, with option to navigate to PIN reset flow. Blocks access until correct PIN is entered and verified via session.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form component that allows users to enter their name and language preference, with error handling for authentication and backend connection issues.
frontend/src/components/StorageMonitor.t: Displays photo storage usage metrics with a progress bar and warning alerts when storage approaches or reaches capacity limits.
frontend/src/components/StoryEditor.tsx: Form component for creating new memories with title and description fields, supporting both Hindi and English languages.
frontend/src/components/StoryList.tsx: Displays a list of memories with edit and delete functionality for admin users, including dialogs for updating and confirming deletions.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Badge component showing real-time sync status (online/offline, syncing, error, success) with appropriate icons and Hindi labels.
frontend/src/components/TotalStorageMoni: Dashboard card displaying total storage usage across photos, videos, documents, and memories with a progress bar and breakdown by category.
frontend/src/components/VideoGallery.tsx: Displays a grid of uploaded videos with thumbnails, play/preview functionality, download capability, and admin delete controls. Includes loading states, empty states, and confirmation dialogs for video deletion.
frontend/src/components/VideoStorageMoni: Shows video storage usage metrics with a progress bar and warning alerts when storage exceeds 80% or reaches capacity. Displays used/total storage in MB/GB with Hindi labels.
frontend/src/components/VideoUpload.tsx: Handles video file uploads with progress tracking, automatic thumbnail generation from video frames, and 100MB file size validation. Uses ExternalBlob for chunked uploads with progress callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, automatically recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries. Initializes access control for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity state management, and session persistence. Includes status tracking for initialization, login progress, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguage.ts: Zustand store for managing language preference (Hindi/English) with persistence to localStorage. Tracks whether user has explicitly selected a language.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinSession.ts: Manages PIN verification session state using sessionStorage, providing verify/clear functions and loading states for PIN-protected admin features.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, photos, videos, documents, memories, and admin functions. Implements automatic refetching with configurable intervals and cache invalidation strategies.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncStatus.ts: Custom React hook that monitors online/offline status and tracks React Query sync state, providing sync status including connectivity, syncing state, last sync time, and errors with Hindi error messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, mobile-responsive font sizing, and custom gradient utilities for a modern elegant design.
frontend/src/lib/googleOAuth.ts: Empty file for Google OAuth functionality (not yet implemented).
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: TypeScript type definitions for translation keys covering all UI strings across welcome, language selection, navigation, profile, PIN system, dashboard, stories, storage, photos, documents, and other app features.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Empty file for admin dashboard page (not yet implemented).
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Empty file for main dashboard page (not yet implemented).
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Documents page component that requires PIN verification and conditionally renders DocumentUpload for admins and DocumentGallery for all authenticated users with decorative background.
frontend/src/pages/MediaCenterPage.tsx: Media center landing page displaying four category cards (Photos, Videos, Documents, Memories) with bilingual support, logout functionality, and admin-specific features.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesPage.tsx: Memories page component that requires PIN verification and shows StoryEditor for admins, StoryList for all users, and a storage monitor with decorative background.
frontend/src/pages/OAuthCallback.tsx: Empty file for OAuth callback handling (not yet implemented).
frontend/src/pages/PhotosPage.tsx: Photos page component that requires PIN verification and renders PhotoUpload and PhotoGallery components, checking admin status to control upload permissions.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page with editable name, language preference, profile picture upload/removal, and PIN change form, supporting bilingual UI and toast notifications for user feedback.
Displays a storage dashboard with total usage metrics and category breakdowns (Photos, Videos, Documents, Memories) using cards, progress bars, and alerts for storage warnings.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Renders the Videos page with PIN verification, showing VideoUpload component for admins and VideoGallery for all authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity login, displaying app branding, features, and a login button with loading states and bilingual support.
frontend/src/types/frontend-types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Documents and Memories metadata and request types, marked as frontend-only since backend implementation is pending.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, responsive container settings, extended spacing for safe areas, and custom keyframes for animations.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking authentication issues, security bug with cross-user storage access via email, and completed features for Memories and Documents sections.
